Chained Carvers

Dirtied cloths]></entry> <entry id="fe_devourer_armour_2"><![CDATA["Clean" cloths
Blood soaked bandages
The Wrappings of a Beast
Wrappings
There is no Space for two ladies my size.
Either one of us goes, or one of us dies.
Don't even think about it.
RESOLVE PENT UP FEELINGS
SATIATE HUNGER
ALLURING PHEROMONES
RECYLCLE REGURGITATE
Produces 5-8 Food
You fight like an animal.
We all have demons to fight, so let's give our all.
I'll leave you some scraps next time
Don't move or I will bite
It's not that bad, don't worry.
That's a tasty wound gone.
We will devour them all!
There will be no meat left on their bones.
The light of the moon will reflect in their blood!
I gotta go on a walk. Don't follow.
This is too cramped, need to stretch my legs
*Sniff Sniff* Give me moment I smell blood
What do you mean bones are not edible?
Leaving so much scraps, what is wrong with you all
If you won't eat it, I WILL
*click* *click* *click*
just take a deep breath you all, it isn't poison
Feeling better? Thought so.
*Glugh* *Ourp* uhhn I better not see any of this wasted.
*Bwouuurrrp* mhn now Feas.t
Hmn... *urp* Dinner ready.
YOU DARE?
Next time I'll break your head.
UNgh...
Why did we halt?
Onward to feast!
So bright, So warm...
little brighter maybe?
Back to the old ways I see.
Watch out! Coming through!
I see you're just as hungry...
I felt NOTHI- ok maybe a little bit...
NGh- This is MY blood!
I will not give this to you...
No, no, not again...
This burns... Stop this!
This is my emergency SNACK! Leave them alone!
Don't you dare hurt my lunch!
I CAN'T TAKE THIS ANYMORE
THE VOICES... they stopped...
NO... not like... this...
Too much food...
I NEVER TRUSTED ANY OF YOU...
DON'T TOUCH MY FOOD, MINE mi-...
YOU HATED ME, YOU ...
I WANT TO GO Ho... home...
Somebody, give me food... NOW
I cannot fight with all these wounds...
I feel light... that's not good.
Heavy Steps... I will get through this.
This is no place to die with so much meat on the line
I must still consume so much...
*growl*
*violent head shake* No... no.
*Heavy Breathing*
this isn't right... why...
Hey, hey BACK OFF.
You try to touch me? You lose a hand GOT IT?
This one lost their hand, who's NEXT?!
I literally fling chains, what were these supposed to do?
I am fine, just tired...
I can heal this off myself, just give me time!
*grunts*
Leave me ALONE!
Finally some good service!
FOOD!!!
Don't bother with plates.
Gambling... can I win a meal here?
What do you mean cards are not edible?
If I lose, someone is losing their head.
... Don't look at me like that...
H-hey! That abdomen is sensetive...
Look down there again And I swear you will lose your eyes.
Ah, my favorite place to sleep...
The Only God seems to be down below.
The only God that ever contacted me, their light was not divine...
Another place to sleep? Neat.
Why leave me alone to my own thoughts?
I knew there was a bar with good drinks around here!
Never drank, but gosh this stuff that they bleed here is better than beer
What do you mean... "too big on all accounts"?!
I am not new to denial, but this genuinely hurt...
nevermind, they never brought enough food anyway...
*slow breathing*
this is... fine.
I swear I could hear something back there.
I need to rest, or I might start biting people
I need to Calm down and my gosh your arm looks really chewable...
I need... I need...
*stomach growl*
NO, NO I WANT OUT, OUT THIS TOWN!
Why are they all staring SO MUCH???
Of course you all despise me...
No, no I should have stayed ALONE!
You are all nothing but meatbags to chew on!
*chews on own arm*
I will eat them all, ALL OF YOU.
*Display of Gluttony, beyond disgusting to describe*
*Munch* *Snap* *Bwouuurrrrp*
*Hwourp* More... *urp*
Bring me More... I SAID MORE!
Alcohol... maybe just a bit?...
Why nobody wants to play against me? I bit off a leg only off of one guy...
These chairs are uncomfy... I can hear them creak...
You got 5 aces? Guess I lose... say bye to your head
-And that's what makes foxes so bright orange usually- wait why are you leaving?
*snooooreeeee*
Dra'shai... keep those around me safe from me...
*slurp* mmm tastes like prion disease.
We... we made it... We actually made it...
That meat... it did not taste good... never again.
If there's smaller amount of people than when boarding, don't look at me...
God, finally here, I'm starving!
What are you all DOING?!
Seriously? Are we seriously doing this right now?!
Step Aside! I will kill you last!
If I stayed alone I would never have these problems
Those muscles are only useful to build fat on me.
Your meat tastes like disease But I will still eat it.
Are you trying to make me eat you?
You will thank me later!
THIS is how you do it!
Am I the only one doing anything here?
*Growl* You do not feed me, you get eaten
MEAT!
I should eat one of you onstead of those measly provisions...
Going alone would be easier, faster, and would leave more food for me to eat.
Skin, Bones, only some muscles... gosh it's pathetic to even eat you...
You literally chopped off the tastiest part into the mud!
Don't kill it! I want to eat it alive!
With those hits you should go become a butcher for me instead...
Great, now we die and no one gets to eat
Can you try a little harder so we can go back to hamlet quicker? I'm starving.
Few more hits and you're my next meal.
I will not waste any meat remember!
Spray that blood more in my direction next time, ye?
As if you could get past my ass
Yeah, back into my maw so I can crunch ya!
Try moving, and I will put you under my Paw.
You do not deserve my help.
What? You epext me to help you? After what you've done?
Feed me first, then we can talk
Gosh, stop yapping, I don't want your help!
Touch me and you'll be the next corpse I eat.
I knew this would end like this...
Why even try? I never belonged here...
And I thought I found somebody that cares...
I thought we could feed each other...
We are nothing alike, why bring me along?...
Am I a dog to you all? I should be with those monsters...
Just take me... please...
I cannot be an outcast forever!
We all are food for others... that includes me...
No, go first, I don't want this.
Why force me here?!
I don't want to be hurt anymore...
is there a point to this slaughter?
I eat to survive... I am not hungry now...
This... is new...
Why I do not hunger anymore?
I am hungry!... THEN WHY CAN'T I EAT?
NGAH!
TAKE THIS...
NO... just... no...
I should eat... but cannot, what if I hunger later? During combat?
My stomach turns... I feel like puking...
I feel like only able to release toxins...
DO IT I DARE YOU!
FREE MEAL FOR YOU!
Just do it...
*huff* *huff* I knew I would get hungry...
AH- My stomach...
My mind... it hurts... it yells...
Let me stay here! forever... as always...
Leave me, like all others!
I don't need this, I don't need anything...
I just want... nothing...
NO... I... just don't trust you
Heal me? with fancy words and a magic glow?... I wish I could do that...
I'm trying but... it does not work...
*frustrated noises*... NO I can't do this...
Just leave me alone...
I don't need you!... I...
Why are you making this so difficult?
I don't need to feel strong!... I always was... all the time...
You see me as weak?... of course you do...
I'm just an unstable abomination to you, aren't I?
STOP LOOKING AT ME!
Stay away from me, I will Bite you!
Don't come closer! I... I cannot think..
No, no, don't look at me, don't even try.
Why am I always on the front? Am I just a meatshield?
The eyes... they are everywhere! But I cannot see them!
I... I cannot see... everythings turning black!
*Heavy breathing* No, NO, PLEASE STOP. I CAN'T-!!
I'M NOT A MONSTER, please stop... please... *sobs*
*starts crying uncntrollably*
THE EYES- I CANNOT- It's somewhere here...
They're disgusted of me... I don't want them looking at me...
Please just, leave me here...
There is something in those woods... staring...
Gods, they see us as ants... they will burn us if see fit...
WhAt?! Who where?!!
Angh-! Wait why?!
Stop!... it hurts!
AAHN-
NO- GOD that was way too close...
<Cowering>
No please, you have to do this... I can't...
YOU MISSED? We're doomed oh God, time to pick a god to believe in.
NO!... God, We're runniing out of time...
Curse all gods! All of them!
That blood... it shouldn't be ours that's spilled...
Good, good, we can do this... right?...
No, no, nooo...
Everyone please just stop...
No! Please not there!
I will not move! I'm staying here.
What? no? it's too tight! I will not get past them!
No, ask someone else, please...
NOOOooooooo...
... I... cannot, I just cannot...
Please... I need time, I need... I need...
I... I failed us all...
Wait no, What are we doing? We should not fight!
Can't you see... they are like me... confused... scared...
Boil them, chop them, and then serve them for me!
What do you mean I cannot just eat them all in one bite?
Going headfirst into battle is best way to survive!
BLOOOOOD!!!
I can smell their fear!... wait that smell passed behind me...
Hey psst, ya got any food in your backpack?
I can get more accurate hits from behind you all.
Give me moment gotta just... ye no that's just a rock.
*Inspired gasp* I could eat one of ya temporarily to protect from oncoming attacks.
does the body have to be dead to reanimate it's skeleton?
Ugh... after this I'm going to Brothel eat some lady and pass out.
hmmm... oh wait we're in battle!
Is... this correct move? are you sure- wait no-!
Give me moment- This spot in my back is sooo itchy-
Oops! Sorry- why are you bleeding? It suits you tho.
Sorry, was aiming at someone else.
Will I be less hingry if I don't eat once?
Ughhh... I think I tried to eat too much... *spits back the food*
This meal isn't fresh...
Okay I know you all wanted me to do that, but I just felt this was more appropriate?...
Oh wait you meant... ooooh... please don't be mad at me...
AHA- Oh no... oh noooo....
*sniffs* Do you smell that? I think I accidentally released toxins...
How do you get to a woman's heart? well I got those Knives...
Ugh... I think those rags are starting to rip... anyone not in need of clothes?
ugh... my belly gettin big from all these snacks... why are you all looking at me like that?
Hey you! Your mother was a murloc!
ugh, just hit me, I won't feel a thing I promise.
Heck, dodged that like opportunities to improve myself
Woah! that was close... too close...
Hey, next time try not to hit vital organs?... they are quite tasty when whole.
YEAH Spank their ass!
BLEH...
Wha?
Watch out! Oh you already dodged that, good, good.
Lucky Peck Neck
Nope, not this ass stays here
What? you want to move here? Are you serious?
Why waste this now? I can take care of this alone.
Nah, not needed, watch this.
This is just a scratch! Come on, fight goes on!
I can heal myself, thank you, lemme just eat something.
strength is shown by doing things without any special enhancements!
I am not weak... *starts sobbing*
I am resting. Later. *Huff*
Currently looking at this cute tentacle here, give me moment
ughhh, lemme just roll over... *huff*- oh gosh, I cannot stand up...
What? Sorry, was looking at the Sky.
I think I'm about to pass out I'm so sleepy...
Huh, so my blades CAN hurt me...
Ooooh so this is what happens when I let out some deeper spit...
Leave? There's so much meat here!
Since no one can see this message... Devourer has a HUGE DICK AND BALLS
AHN- Hey that hurt!
I think you just hit me in ribs. That's bad.
Excuse me, I'm allergic to being hit
Oh, yeah forgot to mention: watch out they are bad guys
*kisses the wound* Don't worry it will heal.
AHNNN-ghhh-...
Blood, All I can see is blood!
My Veins, My heart, all is on fire and itching!
This is my Chance to get into their WOUNDS!
Hurt me, it's nothing compared to the horrors I will commit.
Bring it on!
I will cry a river of blood, and make everyone else feel it.
hurt me all you want, I felt the worst already.
Blood, Blood, Blood and Darkness...
I just wanna feel something...
The pain of the body dwindles to that of the mind!
Let them come, let em jurt us, let em see we do not give up.
My body hungers for PAIN, not food...
Ungh... Not now.
HURT ME- I DARE YOU TO TRY.
Hahaha- try me...
DO IT, I dare you lil things!
Let them smell the blood, let em come!
It's nothing compared to what I will do to them...
The Battle GOES ON.
No, No NO not yet!
*whimper*
I can take this... I can take this...
Do it again!... please...
Is my ass really not fat enough to hit?!
Try again Peck Neck
It was me who was supposed to be hit!
NO why you?! It should have been me!
No, this is my place to fight!
Leave me here!
You'll have to push my ass to move me from here!
This pain is mine to bear!
Don't touch me with those!
This is my pain to keep to empower me!
Just leave me be alright?!
Don't you see this weakness empowers?!
Just let me be this way!
Why everyone wants me to change?!
Bit preoccupied, Sorry.
Not gonna waste my time on this.
You, just like me do not deserve this.
This is no place to waste things on me.
Those wounds are here to stay.
use your skills on someone else...
This blood... it will get everywhere... even you.
Hunger, can be stopped. But how do you quench it if all that is left is other people?
Your face... it looks maulable...
YOU- YOU ALL HATE ME?!
You all lied to me, all of you!
I thought I could trust you...
What? Why? I don't trust this position...
Are you smiling? Why are you smiling?!
Why everyone is looking at me this way...
I don't want to be chained, leave me alone LEAVE ME ALONE!
PLEASE I WAS GOOD- I was good, I did not do- I didn't mean to-
I don't understa-PLEASE NO- I WILL BE BETTER!!!
No... Please... please...
*whimpers and sobs*
*cries uncontrollably* Nooo... nooo...
Please, I am doing things, I am working-
nghn- please... please...
I'm doing my best... forgive me...
NO- I'm so sorry! Please- forgive me-
This wasn't meant to hit you- no, nooo...
No... I can stay without food... I don't need it...
Please, I'm not hungry really... I'm not a monster...
*whimpers and cries loudly*
You all hate me... Just say it... I know you do...
I never meant to become this.. is it wrong to love this body?
Ah- why you all smiled at that...
Ngh- *heavily breathes* How much more...
I... did not mean to run I...
This... was a mistake...
Shh it's ok, we'll do better next time... please...
We can do this... I promise...
Oh gosh, are you okay?... Please don't get angry at me...
*holds breath in*
You'll get them next time...
*pathetic whimper*
No, please, let me stay here- PLEASE...
No that space... looks... secluded...
I don't need anything, I promise, I'm alright!...
No, I will be fine, Really!...
No, please, please no...
No- NO NOO!
I don't need healing, I am alright please!
NO STOP STOP! I DON'T NEED HEALING!
Why waste this on me right?...
Others need it more...
I don't need this... I don't need this...
Please... ask someone else...
Leave me be...
I am not good at this...
Please, don't touch me...
I am fine alone... thank you really...
Please no... Just no...
I can fight! I will fight!... I will do better!
No, no, please don't leave me here!
I AM DONE, I AM DOING EVERYTHING HERE.
Useless! All of you!
How did I end up with you all...
Shut up everyone, none of your ideas are any good!
I ain't sharing any spoils or meat with any of you
Everyone should be thanking me for keeping you all alive...
COME AT ME BEASTS! One of yours has step out.
Step Aside Fool.
Leave this to me to get things done.
Nah, you take this hit.
You know what? You would be more useful here.
Step aside, Fox Butt incoming.
I don't need to do everything here, you take care of this.
I'm tired. Leave me be.
Me? Do something? I've done everything so far!
Finally, MY TURN.
My plan this time!
*Huff*
I've done so much... what do you all have to say for yourself eh?
I've kept you all live, now bring me food and handfeed me.
Make yourselfs useful and rub my belly.
Hit someone else finally! Why always me?!
This should be you here getting hit!
Not bad... But not Good enough.
You should join the Butchers at the Hamlet with these poor hits!
I could hit that while immobile!
I have pounds of fat on me and I still hit. What's your excuse?
Not doing anything today, Just relaxing.
Just bring me food instead.
Nah.
CHOP THEIR HEADS OFF! WE FEAST TONIGHT!
Their guts will be served on Golden Platters!
Breathe in! Smell this? It's Life, it's purpose, IT'S BATTLE!
This is no place to fall, get up everyone!
They're trying to get into our heads, well not today!
Your foul tricks do not work on me Shadows!
get up, do not succomb yet.
Stay With me! *slaps their cheeks*
Vigor through the veins! Fire through the Blades!
Choose a God, and pray they do not answer, foul beings! For they will falter too!
This is our chance to end this quickly, to arms!
aim for arteries! Make them our Lunch quickly!
This is supposed to be what drives me over the edge? Pathetic.
Bark louder, I might finally hear you.
These creatures do not scare me. I am the true Beast here.
Pathetic Underlings, BOW before me!
Blood Quickens, mine for action, yours for fear.
Lunch before me shall give me Vigor and Strength!
Nothing can kill me!
I am unstoppable!
Feast Makers
These creatures left me here to rot...
I WILL SLAUGHTER THEM ALL NOW.
BLOOOD- the feast... awaiting...
Ah, of course me... Monster in Looks, always to die first...
Pathetic, barely felt it!
Your foul Words have no effect on me! I hope...
Those Enchantments are half a millenia old and spelled incorrectly!
Agh! Don't touch the... lil... tasty one...
Kill the Rotting one First!
Good shot! Can you teach me how to do that?
Now that's a clean kill!
Again! Again!
Over already? But the gunshow has just begun!
Outta the way! Her highness is coming through!
I can't very well strike them this far back!
I need to reload my guns!... Yes! All of them!
Your princess demands your valiant protection!
You and I? We can win this, together!
You are tougher than you look!
You'll get 'em next time, here, let me help!
This is the part where you shoot a young child
Should you really contemplate on the morality of shooting children? Eh...
